text: 330 ml bottle. Hazy honey gold color. Large frothy white head. Sweet lemony, yeasty nose. First sip is tangy, sweet effervescence. Hints of chalk, sweet lemon, rustic bread, vanilla and earthy ferment. Soft on the palate, grainy stewed citrus notes. Dry and spicy notes in finish. Quite delicious is this.

Pours golden colour with a small and white head. Aroma of bread. malts. citrus notes and alcoholic. Fine. Taste is rather dry, lighty maltiness, hoppy and grassy finish. Medium body, quite drinkable. A hint of alcohol. Good.

Good aroma, taste, and color.
I drink it together with a risotto. Not sure if it was a good idea.
Near Merode, Brussels, 17.06.2017

0.33l bottle.Pours in golden colour with clear liquid and huge white head. Aroma of hay, floral, herbs, alcohol. Light sweetness, lightly bitter, very lightly sour. Medium body, oily feel, average carbonation, bitter and alcohol warmth finish

Aromas of citrus zest, crusted bread, peppery spice, and phenolic esters. Taste is citrus zest, pear, crusted bread, slight vanilla, peppery spices, mint, bubblegum esters. Grassy hop bite in the finish. Slight banana flavor appears as it warms in the end.

busy with fruit, yeast and beer spice. light on the palate with vibrant carbonation. golden in flavor and full body. refined sweetness bitter in the middle and finishes a bit on the dry. complex and beautiful.

UPDATED: JUN 22, 2017 Aromat: z butelki przyprawowo - owocowo z lekką dominantą banana, chlebowy, ze szkła zdecydowanie bardziej przyprawowo, pieprznie, nawet lekko drażni nozdrza w miarę ogrzewania dochodzą nuty pomarańczowe 
Wygląd: barwa złota, lekkie zmętnienie, piana wysoka o barwie złamanej bieli, trwała, drobno- i średniopęcherzykowa, ładnie zdobi szkło
Smak: początkowo wydaje się być słodowy, ale po każdym łyku jest przykrywany na zmianę przyprawowością i gorzkim smakiem pomarańczy, wytrawne, dosyć ciężkawe, alkohol dobrze ukryty, ale lekko drapie w gardle, goryczka średnia, wyraźnie pomarańczowa
Podniebienie: wysokie nagazowanie, pełne, mało pijalne
Podsumowanie: no średnio jest, niby aromat ciekawy w smaku też coś się dzieje, ale ogólne wrażenie zostawia bardzo ciężkie, daje znać o sobie w żołądku w bardzo nieprzyjemny sposób

Somewhere in between dark golden and light orange, slightly hazy. Good frothy and quite dense white head, good retention and nice lacing. Aroma has a light bready/crackery malts base, strong fruity esters (pear, maybe peach and strong banana), plus spicy and herbal hints. Taste has crisp bready/crackery maltiness, feels slightly earhty/yeasty, boosts strong fruitiness (candied fruit, banana, pear), moderate spiciness and a touch of alcoholic warminess. Overall quite on the sweet side in the mouth but a dry, bitter herbal finish gives it a quite unique character for the style. Medium to dense body with quite high carbonation, with a rich and mouthfilling but also quite heavy feel. Definitely a dense, complex, warming tripel, and definitely a not too easy beer. To be enjoyed slowly.
Barwa ciemnozłota, średnia piana. W aromacie słody i nuty owocowe. Dość złożony smak, lekko słodkawy, wytrawny finisz. Dobrze ukryty alkohol. Przyjemna niska goryczka

Uma cerveja forte (9.5%) mas com um paladar que não se percebe o elevado teor alcoólico. Possui um ótima formação de espuma, um amargor bem balanceado com aroma frutado sem excesso. Bem equilibrada e com excelente finalização.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Leicht eingetrübte, goldene Farbe mit feinporiger, durchaus langlebiger Schaumkrone. Im Geruch Hefe, Fruchtigkeit und frischer Hopfen. Geschmacklich zeigen sich süße Aromen gepaart mit Früchten, spürbarer, gut eingebundener Alkohol, Würze und einer leichten Bitterkeit. Malz und Hopfen halten sich die Waage. Ausdrucksstark.

My all time favorite!
Strong blond triple with a complex palate. Nice golden colour and a taste that goes on forever.
As perfect as a beer can be. The taste is strong yet subtle. Even if you drink accidently too many of it, it doesnt give you nasty hangovers.

Hazy golden, white head. Aromas are subtle and complex: ripe bananas, alcohol, hay, fruit esters, grains. Medium-full body, light carbonation. Taste is sweet, as expected, with some alcoholic warmth. Candy, spices, a bit of hops, bananas. Crispy, dry aftertaste. Quite balanced and complex, this is a very good tripel.
Aroma of yeast, fruit. Light golden appearance. Complex taste, slightly sweet and rather bitter. Its a very good beer.

Rich yeast smells. Pours a cloudy gold with a big rocky white head. Slight lacing. Sour barnyard flavors and coriander, with a lingering bitter finish. Complicated but interesting flavors balancing one another. High carbonation. A lot of flavor but the alcohol is not very forward for a 9.5%. Impressive.
300ml on tap at the Taphouse, Munich. Aroma is metallic, light alcohol. Appearance is cloudy orange with a white foam. Taste is light sweet and bitter. Good.
Greetings from Bydgoszcz, Poland to all Beer Geeks and Hopheads around the world!

Light golden, clear. Not very strong aroma, fruity. Complex taste, more bitter than sweet. Very good

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Gul, klar, mycket vitt skum.
Doft: kryddig, apelsin, lite syrligt, jäst
Smak: honung, apelsin, jäst, ganska söt, lite spritig.

UPDATED: MAY 20, 2017 I haven?t drank too many tripels in my life, so I can?t compare, but I find this beer great tasting. It makes a lot of thick foam. The taste is of average complexity with little sweet with quite big biterness which hits you quickly and stays long.
Light golden, clear. Not very strong aroma, fruity. Complex taste, more bitter than sweet. Excellent, just a little bit short of the best in its style.
Another one of my faves from Belgium - an excellent, strong, tripel which will give you guaranteed good vibes!

Goud kleurig bier met een romige witte schuimkraag.

Aroma: banaan, zoet, bubblegum, gist

Smaak: zoet, fruitig, perzik, gist, moutig, alcohol en een bittertje in de afdronk.

Mijn favoriete tripel.

Aroma: tyggegummi, banan, noe brødskorpe. Fenolisk. Svakt tåkete øl med kraftig karbonering. Kraftig, vedvarende hvitt skum. Lett kropp. Smak av malt med brødskorpekarakter. Noe bittert. Tørr avslutning.

Bottiglia da 0,33. Schiuma chiara e molto abbondante. Colore biondo opaco. Giusta carbonatura. Aromi di frutti e agrumi. Gusto dolciastro al palato con un finale deciso e retrogusto contrastante amaro. Altlena di sensazioni. Ottima birra. Consiglio 10/10.

Aroma: Malt, fruits.
Appearance: Golden, clear with a small white head.
Taste: Sweet, pear, fruit, alcohol.
Palate: medium body, high carbonation

Bottle from bierland. A tough one. Do I only enjoy drinking this because it is mightily strong? It has a wonderful constant light fizz, deep gold and good head. Very big alcohol profile. Not so sure there is much depth in flavour personally, not as tasty as Karmeliet. Bitter-sweet.
UPDATED: MAY 7, 2017 Aus der Flasche getrunken (Händlerlieferung). Orangegelb mit extremen Schaum im Glas. Perfekt im Geschmack und perfekt eingebundener Alkohol.

UPDATED: MAY 21, 2017 An aroma with perhaps even some funky notes compared to what youd expect of the style (which to me seems more like a highpowered blonde than a tripel but who cares about the nomenclature). A nice bitterness to round out the flavor.
12oz bottle pours hazy yellow with white head aroma is malt and banana taste is honey banana and caramel boozy finish
33cl bottle. golden hazy color. medium white head. yeast, hops, citrus, medium carbonation and bitterness. great.

Bottle. BB: 10/2018. Pale yellow/gold colour, white head, small chunks of yeast swimming around. Aroma sweet, fruity, apricot, white bread, floral. Taste is firstly sweet and rich in flavours, then kick some spiciness and bitterness. Palate is balanced with dried fruits notes. Alcohol quite well hidden and beer appears to be light but you cannot get tricked due to 10 percent ABV. Belgian piece of art.

#1324Bottle. Hazy yellow body, high white head. Aroma of belgian yeast, honey, apples, apricots, alcohol. Taste is neutral, lightly bitter, quite dry finish. Apples, honey malts, grains. Fuller body, high carbonation. Nice.
Bottle 0.33l. Cloudy, gold colored. AROMA- apples, honey, malt, grain. FLAVOR- neutral to dry, moderately bitter, slightly warming, again apple, honey, grain. Full bodied. Tasty.

Bottle at Beer oclock Bucharest. Strong but bit flat for tripel. Aroma full of flowers, orange and banana, but also bit too much of alcohol. Hazy yellow colour with long white head. Complex body, spicy, citruses, raisins, high bitterness, hops, long pleasant finish, sweet, bitter, raisins. Very good mass produced tripel.

Aroma is spice, biscuit, caramel and bread. Pours golden, with a frothy white head which lasts well. Tastes of dried fruit, stone fruits, spice, banana, vanilla,malt,caaramel. Rich, creamy mouthfeel, good carbonation.

Bottle into a tulip. Pours a hazy medium yellow, with a huge white head that persists. Nose is typical tripel- malt with banana and clove notes. Taste follows. A fine exemplar of the style. Trappist ale- nothing more need be said.
Butelka. Banany, brzoskwinie, słód, drożdże, fenole. Ocena na podstawie notatek pisanych przed założeniem konta na RB.

Flasche am Flughafen in Brüssel
Trübes Bernsteingelb, fester Schaum
Aroma:Hefe, Getreide, etwas Zitrus im Hintergrund.
Geschmack: sehr vielschichtig, Hefe, Grapefruit, Pfirsich, malzig,
UPDATED: APR 17, 2017 330ml bottle. Pours bright gold and hazy with a decent head. Elderflower, peach, apricot, lemon, bitter grapefruit, pepper, clove, cinnamon. Superb.
Bottle brewed at 28.06.2016. Pale colour, hazy, rocky head, poor lacing. Aroma is peach and quite much alcohol. Lively carbonation. Too much alcohol in taste.
Hazy golden colour with dissapearing white head, aroma is malty and fruity, banana also, taste is malty, light fruity sweetness with fine bitterness and bitter aftertaste.
Bottle. Pours cloudy yellow. Aroma is Belgian dirty candy, lightly citric. Body is medium to heavy, lively carbonated, quite sweet with a late bitterness. Palate lingers on sweetness. Good.

0.33l bottle. Malty aroma, banana, fruits. Hazy yellow color, white head. Malty taste, light fruit notes, light sour, light to medium bitter, light alcohol. Full body, slick texture, average carbonation and dry bitter finish with light warming alcohol notes. Good.

Bouteille avec un BB du 25/08/2018. Robe dorée trouble où se baladent quelques petites particules et surmontée dun beau col de mousse blanc et crémeux qui ne semble pas vouloir sen aller. Arômes de levures belges soyeuses, orange, banane et sucre candi. Quelques effluves de clou de girofle, miel poire et cantaloup. En bouche, levures belges et épices sucrées, confit dorange, banane séchée, cantaloup. Arrière-goût plus âcre où lalcool se fait un peu sentir ainsi que quelques herbes grillées mais en général, les saveurs sont dans un créneau assez doux. Texture semi-onctueuse et corps moyen.

Aroma is sweet, malty with fruit, toffee, apricot, mild spice. Pours golden with large, effervescent head, looks spectacular with great retention and lacing. In taste very creamy, malty, rather sweet, fruity, offset by spice (esp. cloves) and champagne-like flavor and mild-moderate herbal bitterness. Yeastiness lingers in the background. Slightly noticeable alcohol. Spice and hops in aftertaste. Full body, very nice texture yet quite high carbonation. First impact was amazing, then I got used to it (esp. since I can only take so much cloves & champagne). Good.

Pours with light creamy foam. Color is cloudy wheat beer. Aroma is fruity and yeasty and has apricot, vodka, champagne. Palate is perfectly balanced. Taste is delicious and has wheat beer, elderberry, banana and some warm alcohol. Quite sweet. Enjoyable in small portions.

UPDATED: MAR 24, 2017 330 ml bottle from Systembolaget. APPEARANCE: hazy golden with a large white head. NOSE: strong yeasy aroma of fruits, floral, spices, banana; bread and hay. TASTE: moderatly sweet, a little bit bitter. MOUTH: medium body, with a semidry texture.

Aromat - kwiatowy, cytrynowy z lekkim bananem.
Piana - średnia, ale bardzo drobna, biała.
Wysycenie średnie. W smaku pomarańcza z bananem.

Small bottle 
Appearance: amber, only a bit hazy, awesome creamy head, unfortunately with rather poor retention, decent lacing
Aroma: mainly banana, cloves and phenols, but also sweet, some brown/burnt sugar notes in the background 
Taste: sweet, brown/burnt sugar like, banana and phenols, for me too high carbonation, 
All in all, very pleasant beer to drink. For me the carbonation was too high. Moreover, alcohol was well concealed; one could only feel very subtle warming while swallowing.

A lovely golden colour and a very nice layered flavour. A definite hit of Belgian yeast with a soft undercurrent of bitter, but smooth hops. This gave a nice mouthfeel and a low level of carbonation rounded off what was a very good package. I think I have found a Belgian that I would drink again!

Bottle, 0.33l. Cloudy golden pour with quite visible carbonation. One finger creamy white head, long lasting. Thick lacing on the glass. Yeasty nose, slightly herbal, touch of toffee and caramel.

Medium body with quite high carbonation, lively and prickly on the tongue. Regular texture. Mildly bitter, somewhat boozy. Aroma of yeast, malts, herbs. Slight toffee and caramel, a bit candy. Strong alcohol presence, both in taste and mouthfeel. Peppery. Very dry finish with lasting alcohol burn.

Overall, nice one.
UPDATED: MAR 11, 2017 Barwa jasna, złota. Piana biała, gęsta, drobna. Aromat intensywny, bardzo typowy dla stylu. W smaku wytrawne, owocowe, alkohol dobrze ukryty. Świetny Triple.
Bottled. I only took numerical notes while having this one. Therefore: ----
Sample golden beer medium head. Aroma is citrus, malt, banana, fruit. Taste is the same. Bitter with sweet. Nice
Golden grain bright color. Aroma is spicy, as is the taste. Also some nice fruit notes and a really creamy mouth feel. Very complex taste but also very balanced.
330 ml bottle at home. Blonde triplel belgian trappist beer. Not my favourite tripel, but a good beer nonetheless.
Excellent triple. Nice, yellow. In vkuche felt that beer is very dense, drink slowly, savoring.

2 dita di morbida schiuma, colore ambrato,ottima carbonatura. Al naso arancia, pesca e frutti che ritornano al palato. Ottimo finale persistente. Quasi 10º ben nascosti. Ottima triple.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Mycket dimmig och grumlig, gul äppelmust färgad, stort fast vitt skum. Doft: Fräsch höstluft, belgo, jäst, nyklippt gräs, lite hav, lätt av röda äpplen. Smak: Belgo, skum fruktgodis, gräs, lite trä, lite alkohol, lite skog.

Birra dal color oro leggermente velato. Schiuma bianca cremosa e persistente. Allolfatto cereali, miele, arancia, pesca. Al palato corpo medio con note fruttate, lievito, miele e marmellata di agrumi. Nel finale rimane, usando un ossimoro, dolcemente amara di luppolo. In quanto avendo una dolcezza da maltosio, ricopre egregiamente lalcolicità della birra e le note amaricanti del luppolo esaltando solo quelle aromatiche di questultimo. Una birra eccellente, ottima con i formaggi.
2 finger frothy head, with lively carbonation and large bubbles. Yellow peachy colour. Such a smooth sweet taste with a slight bitter finish.
True classic and go-to-tripel. Estery,complex, nice body, slight fruit, some alcohol. Perfect.
UPDATED: FEB 25, 2017 Very fruity aroma but not boozy ( genuine fruityness, no bananas... ). Very tasty for a tripel: rich, alcohol well hidden.
Leicht trübes gold mit reichlich Schaum. Malzig, hefig, fruchtig, Banane, leicht blumig, würzig, etwas Pfeffer, sehr süffig.

Barwa pomara?czowa, m?tna z dro?d?owymi drobinkami. Piana koloru bia?ego, "tlusta", niestety o ?redniej trwa?o?ci. Zdobienia raczej delikatne. Aromat wytrawny, owocowy, bia?e winogrona, nuty winne, nieco s?odkie. Smak: podobnie jest wytrawny, owocowy, bia?e winogrona s? tutaj kr?gos?upem. Na finiszu pojawiaj? si? nuty marcepanu, migda?ów. Finisz to delikatna goryczka o charakterze przyprawowo zio?owym, nieco sucha, ostra.

This beer is pretty fuckin great. Pours with a beautiful golden cloudy appearance, and has a yeasty, hoppy aroma and a creamy, soft palate. The 9.5% is pretty well hidden, with some very light bitterness and fruitiness and hoppiness. Exceptionally delightful. Lets see if Rate Beer lets us saying fuckin...

Lets get straight to the point with this one: this is a classic. Generous alcohol level, a lot of bitterness and pretty much everything you can expect from any great abbey beer. Not the most surprising one out there and it doesnt try to impress with any exotic element, but theres no need for it, its already great as it is. Not for the weak! APPROVED BY TAVERNYS BLACK METAL CREW!

bottle, not aged so much in bottle after being bought as date was 2018 expiration, dry, sharp, banana smell with yeast smell, sharp bitterness like whisky aftertaste. long lingering aftertaste with creamyness, alcohol punch after 2 sips bit dry bitterness takes over. Creamy feel, then fruity bitterness, Leave for a while then go back it tastes much better (possibly once btterness and creamy feel goes), more aromas coming through.

Bottle, served in goblet. Aroma is spice, biscuit, caramel and love. Pours golden, with a frothy white head which lasts well. Tastes of dried fruit, stone fruits, spice, banana, vanilla. Rich, creamy mouthfeel, good carbonation. Gangbusters.
Absolute topper onder de trappisten. Vol van smaak met kleurrijk aroma van bitter en zoet. Goede schuimkraag.

Barwa pomara?czowa, m?tna z dro?d?owymi drobinkami. Piana koloru bia?ego, "tlusta", niestety o ?redniej trwa?o?ci. Zdobienia raczej delikatne.
Aromat wytrawny, owocowy, bia?e winogrona, nuty winne, nieco s?odkie.
Smak: podobnie jest wytrawny, owocowy, bia?e winogrona s? tutaj kr?gos?upem. Na finiszu pojawiaj? si? nuty marcepanu, migda?ów. Finisz to delikatna goryczka o charakterze przyprawowo zio?owym, nieco sucha, ostra.
Alkohol nieznacznie rozgrzewa w prze?yku. Wysycenie wysokie w kierunku do ?redniego.

Great aroma of fresh bread, with caramel and some floral notes. Doesnt look great, the head vanishes quickly and the colour is a hazy amber, nothing too special. But its deliciously sweet and tasty, some banana, toffee... Alcohol is very strong too, but for me it feels great. The texture is quite thick and the carbonation just perfect, maybe a bit less than other trappist beers. Possibly my favourite in this style.

Brilliant white, creamy head stayed well on a finely effervescent light golden body. 
Yeast, lemon & clove & banana. 
Medium to full bodied. Smooth on the palate. Tingly on the back.
Belgian yeast flavours with lemon, citrus, banana & clove. Hints of malt. Peppery on the aft. 
This is THE Perfect Tripel.
Bottle. Hazy Gold. Malty, spicy hop flavours. Sweet, rich, vanilla notes. Dry. Yeasty floaters, touch of spirits. Complex. Dry hoppy & whisky aftertaste. Quality Tripel. (2008)

Bottle: 330 ml, Price: 1,65 eur
Geltonai ruda spalva, didelė balta puta, geras skonis..
Hazy yellow colour with nice white head. Aroma of banana, fruit, flower, yeast. Rich taste with remarkable aftertaste
Bottle, fosdem. Unpoured. Scent is strong notes of banana and light of cloves. Light pepper. Taste is consistent almost weizen style. Gorgeous. Finish is smooth and slightly acidic. Very great.

UPDATED: MAY 27, 2017 Pifko wypite ok 2 miesiące po terminie. Barwa jasno złota piana obfita. Aromat przyprawowy, gruszkowy, szampański. W smaku to co w aromacie plus nuty chmielowe i kwiatowe. Zajebiste pifko
Bottle at home. Pours hazy yellow. High carbonation. Tastes cloves, banana, esthers, fruit. Very good tripel. Classy and lovely. Esters are threrebto end. Pleasent.

0,33 l bottle. Pours golden yellow with big frothy white head. Aroma of malt, clove, yeast, some banana, a hint of dried fruit and caramel, some alcohol. its also a bit funky with delicate hop notes. Flavor is very malty, some chewy caramel, some pears and banana. Its medium sweet, lightly bitterness. Alcohol is present, it gives you that nice warm feeling, but it is not annoying though. Body is medium, texture is creamy, carbonation is quite lively. Finish is long and pleasantly spicy bitter.
Klasyczny abbey tripel - przyprawowy, musujący, lekko fenolowy i odrobinę alkoholowy. Nic nowego, ale to piwo wysokiej klasy.

Bottle 0,33.
Dark yellow color, hazy, big long-lasting foamy head. Aroma: yeasty, malty, strong spicy notes. Taste: slightly sweet start, dry, hoppy, spicy, medium bitter finish. Warming alcohol. Well balanced.
Aroma of dark fruit, sweet, yeasty. Pours lively, nice carbonation. Chewy caramel, banana. Sweet finish.
Aroma is citrus, flowers and yeast. Taste is light funky yeasts, sweet fruits, grassy and after a while in the glass also alcohol. Low bitterness.
Ihr aroma of bananas is really impressive and strong but you can still taste the hops and the sweet bitternes. Not my kind of beer but still really good
caramel, vanilla, dough, golden, hazy, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body,

Bouteille acheté début 2014! 

Couleur orangé bien pâle et très trouble. Une mousse blanche, que dis-je? Une crème blanche recouvre se liquide. Une mousse voir sans bulle tellement que cest microscopique. Beaucoup de lie, même bien présente dans la mousse. Wow cest donc bien jolie... Un beau 10/10 pour la présentation du liquide. Merveilleux! Une mousse qui persiste en gardant sa consistance! Une mousse qui a le look dun yaourt vanille parsemé de fines particules de canelles. 

Au nez, ça dégage de fortes odeurs de levure belge, dagrumes et de grosses notes florales (à pétales blanches; amélanchier et le lis on dirait) et des vapeurs de miel flottent sur le dessus.

En bouche, une explosion de céréale dès lentrée suivit de levures belge qui enveloppe le palais jusquà tant que cette amertume nettoie le palais! Une sensation de sécheresse par la suite, je me croirait dans le désert! À chaque gorgée, ou presque, les saveurs ne sont pas identiques. Un fort goût dorange, dépices (poivre et coriandre), de jus de banane, de sucre. Plus elle se réchauffe, plus la chaleur de lalcool se fait sentir tout en douceur! On goûte minutieusement le citron, la poire et la gomme baloune. Intense comme sensation en bouche et dans la gorge tellement cest bon!

330 ml bottle, served in tulip glass. Fantastic hops aroma. Yeasty, fruity and floral. Great bitter taste, probably the reference for a Belgian Tripel. Lively carbonation. Golden colour. One of my favourites!

365 Beers in a Year
Beer 26...339 to go!

Follow all beers on Facebook 
Mark Dashner

Westmalle 
Tripel

Trappist Thursday!!!

Appearance:
Cloudy rich golden hue with a thick white frothy head that dissipates leaving a moderate lacing. 

Nose:
Plentiful notes of banana, clove peppercorn and more, not to mention that classic Belgium yeast aroma!.

Taste
Delightful fruit flavors touch of bready malts and spice to balance it out.

Feel:
Smooth and lively carbonated, with a touch of alcohol.

Another classic from the monks of Belgium!
The cat said, "Yummy!"
.

#365beers1year

#B
Bottle at home. Pours golden with big white head. Aroma is yeast and Belgian hops. Taste has yeast, banana and malts. One of the best triples.

11.2oz bottle. Smells like vanilla, orange, flowers. Excellent carbonation and color, tons of sediment. Taste wheat, apple, orange rind, honey, grass, fresh-cut wood, bit of herb and vegetable spice. Unbelievably smooth, bit of oily feel, physically satisfying (weird right). Top notch drink, as with all the other Trappistes, I only wish Westmalle made a quad!

UPDATED: JUN 22, 2017 best trappist ever? possible. hazy golden color with big head, but foam would stay longer. aroma is doughy and earthy belgian yeasts and slight citrus. complex taste is balanced with peppery hops. full bodied and highly carbonated. strong, slightly bitter and dry finish. flawless mouth feel, dangerous.

UPDATED: JAN 20, 2017 Złocista barwa, wysoka piana średniopęcherzykowa. Aromat słodowy, przyprawowy, drożdżowy, owocowy - rodzynki, jakby winogrona. Momentami pojawia się nuta alkoholowa. W smaku również słodowo. Są wyraźne przyprawy, które nadają lekkiej cierpkości. Wysycenie wysokie. Niestety wyczuwalny alkohol i to chyba największa wada. Piwo w odbiorze dość ciężkie, na pewno na niekorzyść zadziałał wspomniany alkohol, szczególnie na finiszu
Aroma of strong, spicy phenols, wine, fruity esters (apple) and light maltiness. Medium body, cloudy,white head, light bitterness, spicy, light alcohol burnt. Dry finish. Nice

Apple, spices and a touch of banana on the nose. Pours a semi-cloudy gold with visible particulates and a small white head. Taste of spice, alcohol, banana and bread with a bitter, dry finish. Really very good.

Bottle.Hazy pale gold,quite nice but not too stable head,a little lacing.Aroma malty,berries,Belgian spices,honey,pepper,bubblegum,nuts,slight vanilla - incredibly complex if not very intense.Taste thick,smooth but not sweet,slight alcohol.Carbonation initially quite high but soon drops to low.Bitterness high but well balanced.Aftertaste pepper,spices,malts,honey,berries,slight alcoholic warming.Very,very good.

UPDATED: JAN 20, 2017 330 ml bottle. Pours a slightly hazy orange-golden with a huge, rather stable coarse white head. Rather mild aroma, ripe pear, spices (cinnamon, star anise) some alcohol with some leathery yeast. Full body with a lively carbonation and a heavy sweetness. Very rich flavor full of sweet malt, molasses, caramel along with overripe apples and pears, banana, some alcohol and a dry bitter finish.

Golden ale. Pours very clear except for small quantity at the bottom of the bottle. Great head , taste and aroma of bubblegum. Not too sweet for the 9.5% alcohol. Prefer more hops but not bad. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Nice fruity aroma.
Hazy, head is white.
Taste is medium sweet, caramel, fruit.
Medium body.
Very drinkable good tripel. Would drink again.

11.2 oz. bottle, consumed on 12-19-16. 07/05/15, so this is about 1.5 years old at drinking. Pours dark bronze, hazy and cloudy with suspended particulate. Large amount of cream-colored head. Quite impressive and enjoyable appearance. Juicy, creamy aroma. Scents of green grapes and buttery Chardonnay. Candi sugar smell. Simultaneously dusty and fresh aroma. Juicy taste atop an underlying dryness. Bitter finish. Some spiciness. Green grape must. A hint of bubblegum. Full body. Frothy. Perhaps frothier than ideal for me. Nice beer, well made, a classic. Does not wow me but does impress me. A little sweeter than I would prefer, but I like the bitter finish and aftertaste.

Medium frothy and sparkling white head with good retention.
Slightly hazy light golden, finely sparkling.
Aroma is malty, caramel, honey, and slightly spicy.
Dry and crispy taste, yeasty, malty, slightly spicy, with slight sweetness, alcohol presence and almond hints.
High carbonation. Crispy palate.
Bottle. Pours hazy golden with a white head. Aroma is sweet with notes of yeast. Taste has notes of pepper, honey and caramel. Very dry finish.

Belgisk ölkultur är uppförd på UNESCO:s världsarvslista. Den här prestationen platsar definitivt där. Om den lever upp till trappistryktet ska vi kanske låta vara osagt, det handlar inte om någon smakexplosion, men allt är otroligt välbalanserat. Finns inget i smakbilden som drar iväg i nån oväntad riktning. Känns dessutom helt orimligt att den här ska vara drygt 9 procent. Finns inte ett spår av en sån alkoholhalt. Värdet av det får ni avgöra själva.

330ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy golden, long lasting large white head, good lacing. Fruity aroma, apricot and ripe orange, peppery yeast, bread and hay. Full-bodied, medium carbonated, smooth mouthfeel crisp and chewy. Taste is more intense than the aroma, peppery yeast, sweet ripe orange, dried apricots, bread, grassy and mild floral. Rich and long warming finish.

Bière blonde, sans trop de mousse, une odeur de fruits, un peu de houblon, u peu damertume mais qui ne reste pas longtemps en bouche, une bonne bière blonde avec le caractère dune bonne trappiste... bon je ne suis peut être pas objectif, vu que je préfère les trappistes aux autres bieres
faint fruit and spice aromas. golden and hazy in color with huge long lasting head. taste is fairly dry with fruity notes, particularly unripe peach, and hints of raison

Bottle at Belgian beer cafe Sydney. Hazy gold colour with frothy head. Caramel, brandy, fruit, spice. Tastes more fresh than other Trappists. Spicy finish with some bitterness and tartness. Very frothy mouthfeel.

SB beställning, flaska. gyllenbrun med fantastiskt skum. Lacing att drömma om. Lättdrucken fyllig frisk och med en fin ton av humle.
en fantastisk belgisk triple. Fin till kalkon som även den blev lyckad.

Piwo lekko metne w kolorze jasny zloty z obfita sredniopecherzykowa piana zostawiajaca ladne zdobiena na szkle. W aromacie intensywne gruszki, slodkie jablka i przyprawy. Jest tez troche nut pszeniczniaka i belgijskie drozdze. W smaku mamy wszystko to samo, sa tez nuty kwiatowe i chmielowe. Dosc wytrawne z minimalna goryczka i wysyceniem na srednio wysokim poziomie. Lekko alkohol wyczuwalny na finiszu. Bardzo zlozone i ciekawe do dluzszej degustacji.
Pours golden with medium head. Aroma is grassy, outhouse, citrus, yeasty, some fruits. Taste is hops, bitter, caramel, yeast, some grass, citrus, some wood.

33 cl bottle. Pours clear golden with white head. 
Aroma is fruity, apple, pears, bready. Malt, alcohol, yeasty banana, - bit of anis. Medium body, carbonated in the mouth, lingering semi dry feeling in the aftertaste. Much better than I remember.
UPDATED: DEC 21, 2016 Medium light color, two finger white head. High carbonation. Aroma is fruity esters and pepper. Tastes apple and grapes with some honey, slight sting of alcohol. Dry finish.
